# SingleStoreConnection.ConnectionTimeout property

Gets the time (in seconds) to wait while trying to establish a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error. This value is controlled by [`ConnectionTimeout`](../SingleStoreConnectionStringBuilder/ConnectionTimeout.md), which defaults to 15 seconds.

```csharp
public override int ConnectionTimeout { get; }
```
